data.value: Unable to connect to the Internet. If you’re online and still have problems, check out [a href='https://prezi.com/support/article/win-mac/troubleshooting-prezi-for-windows-mac-connection-issues/']this article[/a] for help.

data.name: ViewerPreziHasNewVersionTitle
data.value: There is a newer version of this presentation

data.name: PitchUpdaterUpdateIsInProgress
data.value: Hold your horses, the app is updating

data.name: SettingsUploadBlockedWarning
data.value: Your group admin has disabled the function to view and create synced presentations in this app.

data.name: BluetoothFeatureDialogDescription
data.value:
This lets you use your mobile device as a presentation remote. Once you continue, you’ll see another message from Windows. When you agree to that, {0} will restart. You’ll only need to do this once.
Please make sure to save all your work before continuing.

data.name: EmptyTemplateGroupPlaceholder
data.value: No results for this color selection.

data.name: TrialExpireSoonLessThanOneDay
data.value: Less than 1 day until your trial ends.

data.name: PezExportUnknownErrorTitle
data.value: We could not export your presentation

data.name: PezExportNotEnoughDiskSpaceErrorMessage
data.value: Please free up some space or choose another drive and try to export again.

data.name: ConfirmRevokeLink
data.value: This link will be permanently deactivated and the people you've shared it with won't have access to the presentation anymore.

data.name: LicenseExpiredUpgradeStateMessage
data.value: IMPORTANT! If you plan to close this app in the meantime, please be sure to save all your changes first.

data.name: PbizErrorDescription
data.value: Your presentation couldn't be exported. Make sure you have enough disk space and try again. If the problem persists, please contact support.

data.name: DetailViewOnboardingPresent
data.value: See what you can do with Prezi Next. Then come back here for an exciting surprise.

data.name: PezImportAssetNotFoundInRepoErrorMessage
data.value: Some content such as images, video, or other files might be missing from this presentation.

data.name: LicenseExpirationMultiLineMigrationNeeded
data.value:
Don’t worry, all your presentations are safe. Please upgrade this account to a Pro or Edu Pro license to continue.
If you think you’ve received this message by mistake, please try again or [a href='https://prezi.com/support/?utm_source=prezi_desktop&utm_medium=invalid_license_dialog&utm_campaign=contact_support']contact support[/a].

data.name: PreziDownloadFailDialogTextLine1
data.value: There was an error while downloading the newest version of this presentation.

data.name: PreziDownloadFailDialogTextLine2
data.value: Please try downloading again, or contact support.
